query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ct_badges` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `badgeKey` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `dimension` varchar(50),
  `requiredScore` int NOT NULL,
  `iconUrl` varchar(255),
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ct_badges` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `badgeKey` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `dimension` varchar(50),
  `requiredScore` int NOT NULL,
  `iconUrl` varchar(255),
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
